sentences.sContent: Hobart Town, by degrees, grew to be a fine city, with handsome buildings and well kept streets.
sentences.sCn: 霍巴特镇在一定程度上已经演变为一个惬意的城市，街道整齐，建筑物大方气派；

sentences.sContent: There, at the very foot of the lofty Mount Wellington, Hobart Town began to grow in its new situation.
sentences.sCn: 这里正处于高耸的威灵顿山脚下，一个新的霍巴特镇开始在这里成长。

trans.tranCn: 奥巴特（澳大利亚塔斯马尼亚岛东南岸港市）
